subject: Bobsledding
lead_paragraph: Andy Roddick won his first title of 2009 and his 27th over all, beating Radek Stepanek, 7-5, 7-5, in the final of the Regions Morgan Keegan Championships in Memphis. Only Roger Federer (57) and Rafael Nadal (32) have won more titles among active players.
